definition: double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword

sentences.english: Springing into the table with alacrity, he drew his sword and swung it upon skipper Jackson.
sentences.chinese: 他敏捷的衝向桌子，拔出佩劍向傑克森船長揮去。

sentences.english: In foil and saber, only the attacking fencer can score a point.
sentences.chinese: 在花劍和佩劍比賽中，只有進攻方纔能得分。

sentences.english: He quickly killed Gelert with his sword.
sentences.chinese: 他一下就抽出佩劍將傑樂殺死了。

sentences.english: The defeated general showed his submission by giving up his sword.
sentences.chinese: 這位敗將交出他的佩劍以示就範。

sentences.english: Prince took the sword out of the east spot stopped black maria.
sentences.chinese: 太子拿起佩劍走出東宮當場攔住了囚車。

definition: black hat (worn by feudal official)/fig. official post
nickname of Han dynasty general Li Guang 李廣|李广[Li3 Guang3]
armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
lit. the cicada sheds its carapace (idiom); fig. to vanish leaving an empty shell/a crafty escape plan
well versed in letters and military technology (idiom); fine scholar and soldier/master of pen and sword
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
